Verses: 1 erusalemin Kudigal, Avan Ilaiyakumaaranaagiya Agasiyaavai Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaakkinaargal; Arabiyarode Koodavandhu Paalayamirangina Dhandilirundhavargal Mooththakumaararaiyellaam Kondrupottaargal; Ivvidhamaai Agasiyaa Ennum Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yoraamin Kumaaran Arasaandaan.
2 agasiyaa Raajaavaagirapodhu Irubaththirandu Vayadhaayirundhu, Oru Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan; Omriyin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Avan Thaayinper Aththaaliyaal.
3 avanum Aagaab Kudumbaththaarin Vazhigalil Nadandhaan; Dhunmaarkkamaai Nadakka Avanudaiya Thaai Avanukku Aalosanaikkaariyaayirundhaal.
4 avan Aagaabin Kudumbaththaippol Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan; Avan Thagappan Sendruponapinbu, Avargal Avanukkuk Kedaaga Avanudaiya Aalosanaikkaararaayirundhaargal.

5 avargaludaiya Aalosanaikku Utpattavanaai, Avan Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yoraam Ennum Aagaabin Kumaaranode Kooda, Kileyaaththilulla Raamoththirku Seeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Aasagelukku Virodhamaaga Yuththampannapponaan; Ange Seeriyar Yoraamaik Kaayappaduththinaargal.

6 appozhudhu Thaan Seeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Aasagelodu Yuththampannugaiyil, Thannai Avargal Raamaavile Vettina Kaayangalai Yesreyelile Aatrikkolla Avan Thirumbinaan, Appozhudhu Aagaabin Kumaaranaagiya Yoraam Vyaadhiyaayirundhapadiyinaal Dhaaveedhin Raajaavaagiya Yoraamin Kumaaran Agasiyaa, Yesreyelilirukkira Avanaip Paarkkiradharkup Ponaan.

7 agasiyaa Yoraamidaththukku Vandhadhu Avanukku Dhevanaal Undaana Kedaaga Labiththadhu; Eppadiyendraal, Avan Vandhapodhu Yoraamudane Kooda, Karththar Aagaabin Kudumbaththaarai Sangarikka Abishegampannuviththa Nimsiyin Kumaaranaagiya Yegoovukku Neraaga Veliye Ponaan.
8 yegoo, Aagaabin Kudumbaththaarukku Aakkinai Nadappikkumpodhu, Avan Agasiyaavai Sevikkira Yoodhaavin Prabukkalaiyum, Agasiyaavudaiya Sagodhararin Kumaararaiyum Kandupidiththuk Kondrupottaan.

9 pinbu Avan Agasiyaavaith Thedinaan; Samaariyaavil Oliththukkondirundha Avanai Avargal Pidiththu, Yegoovinidaththil Konduvandhu, Avanaik Kondrupottu: Ivan Than Muzhuirudhayaththodum Karththaraith Thedina Yosabaaththin Kumaaran Endru Solli, Avanai Adakkampanninaargal; Appadiye Arasaalugiradharku Belankollaththakka Oruvarum Agasiyaavin Kudumbaththil Illaamarpoyitru.
10 agasiyaavin Thaayaagiya Aththaaliyaal Than Kumaaran Irandhuponadhaik Kandapodhu, Aval Ezhumbi, Yoodhaa Kudumbaththilulla Raajavamsamaana Yaavaraiyum Sangaarampanninaal.

11 raajaavin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Yosebiyaadh, Kondrupodappadugira Raajakumaararukkul Irukkira Agasiyaavin Aanpillaiyaagiya Yovaasaik Kalavaayeduththukkondu, Avanaiyum Avan Thaadhiyaiyum Sayanaveettile Vaiththaal; Appadiye Aththaaliyaal Avanaik Kondrupodaadhapadikku, Raajaavaagiya Yoraamin Kumaaraththiyum Aasaariyanaagiya Yoidhaavin Penjaadhiyumaagiya Yosebiyaadh Avanai Oliththuvaiththaal, Aval Agasiyaavin Sagodhariyaayirundhaal.
12 ivargalodu Avan Aaruvarushamaaik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Oliththuvaikkappattirundhaan; Aththaaliyaal Dhesaththinmel Raajyabaarampanninaal.
